name: Detective Joseph Somnus and the Dreamkiller
name_original: Detective Joseph Somnus and the Dreamkiller
description:
A game of mystery in which a Detective needs to travel between 2 connected worlds. Our own and dream state to solve the mystery of an unusual killer.

Everything handmade in the 2 weeks time constraint!

Developer: https://cosminalex.itch.io/

3D Design: https://detblack.itch.io/

Sound and Music : https://masterofrevels.itch.io/

Somnus Voice: https://masterofrevels.itch.io/

Assistant Voice: https://detblack.itch.io/
